short.ar,bg: An Extension for Twitter, Export & download tweets to CSV with one click.
short.am,de,el,en_US,es,es_419,et,fa,fi,fil,fr: TwExport is a Chrome extension designed for Twitter that enables you to export and download tweets from any account into a CSV file.
short.bn: Export tweets of any Twitter user.
short.ca,da: One click to export tweet list of any X/Twitter account, save as CSV file.
short.cs,en_GB: Export and download all tweets from a user to CSV for Twitter.
short.en,en_AU: TwExport is a Chrome extension designed for Twitter that allows you to export and download tweets from any account into a CSV file.
short.ja: TwExportは、Twitter向けに作られたChromeの拡張機能で、どのアカウントからでもツイートをエクスポートしてCSVファイルにダウンロードすることができます。
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: TwExport é uma extensão do Chrome criada para o Twitter, que lhe permite exportar e descarregar tweets de qualquer conta, em um…
short.tr: With this chrome extension for Twitter, you can export and download tweets from any account as a CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,et,fa,fi,fil,:
TwExport - Export Tweets allows you to quickly extract and export tweets from any account as a CSV file with one click. 

🏆 Advantage
The TwExport - Export Tweets extension's most significant advantage over others is its ability to intelligently adjust the time intervals between extractions to avoid the common issue of encountering 'Too Many Requests' errors due to Twitter's rate limits, which can lead to minimal data extraction.

👨🏻‍💻 Features
✓ Extract and export Posts from Twitter to CSV
✓ Extract and export Replies from Twitter to CSV
✓ Extract and export tweet information, including id, text, tweet_url, language, type, author_name, author_username, view_count, bookmark_count, favorite_count, retweet_count, reply_count, quote_count, created_at, source, hashtags, urls, media_type, media_urls.

📃 How to Start Exporting?
- Enter the Twitter username or open the extension on the Twitter user’s profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username.
- Select Export Type: Posts or Replies.
- Click the Start Exporting Button.

📬 Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

📃 Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 150 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

🔒 Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

ℹ️ Statement
Twitter is a trademark of Twitter, LLC. Twitter Export Followers-Following is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Twitter, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,zh_CN:
TwExport - Export Tweets allows you to quickly extract and export tweets from any account as a CSV file with one click. 

🏆 Advantage
Our extension can export more data, as we comply with Twitter's rate limits.

🟢 indicates the normal time interval for requests
🟠 indicates the cooldown period's time interval
🔴 indicates the time interval for request errors

👨🏻‍💻 Features
✓ Extract and export Posts from Twitter to CSV
✓ Extract and export Replies from Twitter to CSV
✓ Supports exporting longer tweets
✓ Extract and export tweet information, including id, text, tweet_url, language, type, author_name, author_username, view_count, bookmark_count, favorite_count, retweet_count, reply_count, quote_count, created_at, source, hashtags, urls, media_type, media_urls.

📃 How to Start Exporting?
- Enter the Twitter username or open the extension on the Twitter user’s profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username.
- Select Export Type: Posts or Replies.
- Click the Start Exporting Button.

⚠️ Caution
To avoid being flagged by Twitter's risk control for frequent data exports, we suggest creating a dedicated Twitter account for exporting data.

📬 Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

📃 Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 150 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

🔒 Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

ℹ️ Statement
Twitter is a trademark of Twitter, LLC. Twitter Export Followers-Following is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Twitter, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.

long.ja:
TwExport - ツイートをエクスポートすることにより、ユーザーは任意のアカウントからツイートをすばやく抽出してCSVファイルにエクスポートすることができます。

🏆 利点
TwExport - ツイートエクスポート拡張の最大の利点は、Twitterのレート制限により「リクエスト過多」のエラーに遭遇する、一般的な問題を回避するために、抽出間隔をインテリジェントに調節できる能力です。これにより、データの抽出が極めて少ない状況を防ぐことができます。

👨‍💻 機能
✓ Twitterからの投稿の抽出とエクスポート
✓ Twitterからの返信の抽出とエクスポート
✓ 長いツイートをエクスポートできます
✓ ツイート情報（id、テキスト、ツイートURL、言語、タイプ、著者名、著者ユーザー名、視聴回数、ブックマーク数、お気に入り数、リツイート数、返信数、引用数、作成日、ソース、ハッシュタグ、URL、メディアタイプ、メディアURL）の抽出とエクスポート

📃 どのようにエクスポートを始めますか？
- Twitterのユーザー名を入力するか、Twitterユーザーのプロフィール上で拡張機能を開きます。拡張機能は自動的にユーザー名を入力します。
- エクスポートタイプを選択：投稿または返信。
- [エクスポート開始]ボタンをクリックします。

📬 連絡先
拡張機能を改善するための質問や提案がある場合は、jfl913@gmail.comまでお気軽にお問い合わせください。

📃 条項
毎回、無料で最大150のデータエントリをエクスポートする権利があります。さらに多くのデータをエクスポートするには、Proにアップグレードする必要があります。

🔒 データプライバシー
お客様が処理するすべてのデータは、お客様のローカルコンピュータに留まり、当社のサーバーには一切送信されません。

ℹ️ ステートメント
TwitterはTwitter, LLCの商標です。Twitter Export Followers-Followingは、Twitter, Inc.またはその関連会社または子会社とは提携、承認、後援、またはそれ以外の関連を持つものではありません。
long.pt_BR,pt_PT:
TwExport - Exportar Tweets permite que você extraia e exporte tweets de qualquer conta para um arquivo CSV com um único clique.

🏆 Vantagem
A maior vantagem da extensão TwExport - Exportar Tweets em relação a outras é sua capacidade de ajustar inteligentemente os intervalos de tempo entre as extrações para evitar o problema comum de encontrar erros de 'Muitos Pedidos' devido aos limites de taxa do Twitter, que podem levar a uma extração mínima de dados.

👨🏻‍💻 Características
✓ Extrair e exportar Postagens do Twitter para CSV
✓ Extrair e exportar Respostas do Twitter para CSV
✓ Suporta exportação de tweets mais longos
✓ Extrair e exportar informações de tweet, incluindo id, texto, tweet_url, idioma, tipo, author_name, author_username, view_count, bookmark_count, favorite_count, retweet_count, reply_count, quote_count, created_at, source, hashtags, urls, media_type, media_urls.

📃 Como iniciar a exportação?
- Digite o nome de usuário do Twitter ou abra a extensão no perfil do usuário do Twitter, e a extensão preencherá automaticamente o nome de usuário.
- Selecione o tipo de Exportação: Postagens ou Respostas.
- Clique no botão Iniciar Exportação.

📬 Contato
Se você tiver quaisquer dúvidas ou sugestões para melhorar a extensão, fique à vontade para entrar em contato conosco pelo jfl913@gmail.com.

📃 Termos
Em cada vez, você tem o direito de exportar até 150 entradas de dados gratuitamente. Para exportar mais, você precisa fazer o upgrade para o Pro.

🔒 Privacidade dos Dados
Todos os dados que você processa ficam em seu computador local e nunca passam por nossos servidores.

ℹ️ Declaração
Twitter é uma marca registrada do Twitter, LLC. O Twitter Export Followers-Following não está afiliado, endossado, patrocinado ou de outra forma relacionado à Twitter, Inc. ou a qualquer de suas afiliadas ou subsidiárias.
